Entries.default: "The waters help me forget my troubles - if only for a moment."
"Gellarde! You must try the baths if you have not."
"You must visit the aquarium, ekera. They have a fish as old as Arkemyr!"
"One towel? By the gods, what good is a single towel?"
"The cost is outrageous, but I pay it gladly."
"The waters are the only thing that calm my hemorrhoids."
"What I wouldn't give for a massage and a stiff drink."
